title: "Hey, Broken Desperado" (plate, page 33) from Corps perdu
medium: Engraving from an illustrated book with twenty engravings, ten aquatints (one with drypoint), one drypoint, and one etching (including wrapper front)
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 13 3/4 x 10" (34.9 x 25.4 cm); sheet: 15 3/8 x 11 1/8" (39 x 28.2 cm)
